com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols
Class SimpleFillSymbol

java.lang.Object
  com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractSymbol
      com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.AbstractFillSymbol
          com.iver.cit.gvsig.fmap.core.symbols.SimpleFillSymbol
All Implemented Interfaces:
CartographicSupport, IPrintable, IFillSymbol, ISymbol, IPersistence
public class SimpleFillSymbol
extends AbstractFillSymbol

Basic fill symbol. It will allow to paint a shape with its filling color (and transparency) and the outline.

Author:
jaume dominguez faus - jaume.dominguez@iver.es

drawInsideRectangle

public void drawInsideRectangle(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
                                java.awt.geom.AffineTransform scaleInstance,
                                java.awt.Rectangle r,
                                javax.print.attribute.PrintRequestAttributeSet properties)
                         throws SymbolDrawingException
Description copied from interface: ISymbol
Useful to render the symbol inside the TOC, or inside little rectangles. For example, think about rendering a Label with size in meters => You will need to specify a size in pixels. Of course, you can also to choose to render a prepared image, etc.
